Read in data and plot one or more temp sensors, filter by dates

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}

locations <- read_csv("Sensor_Locations.csv")
setwd("G:\My Drive\Independent Study Fall 2020\McDonald_Hollow")
data <-
    list.files(pattern = "*.csv") %>% 
    map_dfr(~read_csv(.) %>% 
              mutate(Sensor = .x)) %>%
    mutate_at("Sensor", str_trunc, width = 10, side='right', ellipsis = '') %>%
    mutate_at("Sensor", str_replace_all, pattern = ' ', replacement = '')
data <- left_join(data, locations, by = c("Sensor" = "SensorID"))
```
